Name: Hunger Apartment （蚀狱）
About the game: [Please read it Before you buy it!] [Game Guide] In the absurd doomsday world, people only seek one dream, that is no longer worrying about your survival... How lucky! You stumbled into an apartment ,which must be the utopia in everyone’s dreams! This is Hunger Apartment, a place not only feeding you and warming you, but also satisfying even your most insane fantasies. No more hunger, no more displacement But don’t worry, the price is quite affordable, just your delicious humanity in total. However, when you start to find those ugly conspiracies ，and reveal those despicable lies ，will this still be your dream ？ or your destination ？Will it make you surrender your own humanity ？ Will you choose to sort out your minds in a disorder and see the truth in the dark Or continue dreaming in a doze and spend the rest of your life in fake peace? Will you choose to stay awake in chaos and struggle in Samsara Or drift along with the lies and abandon yourself in madness? We tell you everything in a wordless way, will you be able to understand the intricate Karma ？ In the world of Hunger Apartment “Sense” Two distinct characters Can you tell their different meanings behind? 'They ' Unconcerned eyes everywhere Can you take a breath to catch the truth? 'Conspiracies ' Behind the silence Will there be a sparkle to lighten the dark? 'Choices' Say you won’t give up And hear your as well as my stories. ------------------------------------------------------------------ Hush! Walk in, and find your shelter Live, and find the last light ...
